data.text: Dawuda xa maxandi bɛɛti
Alatala, i naxa n ɲaxankata i xa xɔnɛ kui,
I bara n maxɔnɔ i xa tanbɛ ra, i bara n nabira.
Yalanyi yo mu na n bɛ i xa xɔnɛ kui.
N ma yunubie bara gbo n xun ma.
N ma fie bara gbo, e xiri bara ɲaaxu.
N bɔɲɛ bara kana, xunnakeli mu na n bɛ.
N fate birin wolenxi, yalanyi yo mu na sɔnɔn.
N sɛnbɛ bara kana, n fate birin bara ba n ma.
N Marigi, i n waxɔnfe kolon, n ma tɔɔrɛ mu nɔxunxi i ma.
N bɔɲɛ mu saxi, n sɛnbɛ bara ɲɔn.
N xanuntenyie nun n booree bara keli n xun ma
Naxee wama n faxafe, e bara yɛlɛ itala n ya ra.
Kɔnɔ n mu n tuli mati na wɔyɛnyie ra,
N luma alɔ tuli xɔri, n luma alɔ boboe.
Alatala, n xaxili tixi i tan nan na.
N naxɛ, «I naxa tin n yaxuie xa yo n ma,
A gbe mu luxi n xa bira,
N bara n ti n ma yunubi rabaxie ra,
N yaxuie tan kɛndɛ, e sɛnbɛ gbo.
Naxee fe fanyi masarama fe ɲaaxi ra, e n tɔɔrɔma,
Alatala, i naxa n nabɛɲin.
N Marigi, i xa fa mafuren n malide.
